bonus.story: $real was brought up consistently exposed to the Anarchist's way of seeing the world.
$real was  $LUCK  enough to grow up in an Arcology: a corporate fortress city that $ARCOLOGY.

$real was used as a host for bioware, as implanting it in a metahuman is cheaper than keeping it on ice. One day, $real knew they would be killed, and their organs $BAGORGAN . On the other hand, free bioware! Score!
$real was born in the Black Forest Kingdom and saw it evolve into the Black Forest Troll Republic.

$real was brought up in a syndicate-run brothel with the help of $real's many "aunts". They taught $real to be polite and discreet, so as to never be seen by the clients, and some of the many languages $real heard during this time stuck with $real.
$real 's parents were shadowrunners. At a young age, $real was learning important skills such as $SHADOWCHILD .

$real's parents were con artists, and the best thing to happen to them was $real. Who would ever suspect two doting parents and their lovely child? Who wouldn't pay attention to a terrified child that had "lost their parents"? With a cute animal or two added to the mix, $real could distract the best of them.
$real was  $LUCK  enough to be the child of wageslaves, who via endless hours of toil managed to keep a roof over $real 's head.
$real was coding before other kids could read, emerging as a technomancer around the age normal kids are working out that $ALPHABET
$real spent their formative years on a farm, not moving around hay like the farmhands of yesteryear, but instead $FARMDESC.
$real spent their formative years with their parents as they ran away from $FLEE.

modules.name: Have You Heard The Good Word?

bonus.story: $real grew up in an isolated portion of the wilderness like the rednecks of old.
$real was brought up in proximity to of the world's many blighted coasts.
$real was brought up in one of the few small coastal towns around the world.

$real and their family may have been war refugees or hoping for a better life elsewhere, as they where leaving their home country. You are part of the next generation, brought in between two cultures.
$real grew up almost everywhere, shifted from place to place by their $PARRENT 's military duties.
$real was driving before other kids could read the street signs, emerging as one of the best getaway drivers around the age normal kids were learning traffic signals
$real lived in the sprawl and learned how to survive in difficult circumstances.
$real was an orphan, growing up either in a $ORPHAN or on the streets.
$real grew up among mechanics, and some of their skill brushed off on him. On the downside, so did a lot of $STICKY.
$real was brought up in a strictly religious family.
$real was literally born with a gold spoon in their mouth, and looked down on those with silver spoons, as those could tarnish.

Tinkering was what $real lived for. It started with simply identifying the limited cars in the neighborhood. From there scavenging parts and putting them back together. Totally self taught $real worked their way into shops if they weren't chased off
$real was a slave, and spent their childhood $SLAVE
$real was a child of the streets, best described with words like plucky or $INSULTA.
$real had fairly well off parents who paid for a better than average education.
$real had a tough set of teen years but managed to survive.

$real got into a military academy, where they trained to become a commissioned officer in the army of their country.
$real achieved their higher education via their religious community.
$real either never received the opportunity for a further education, or decided it wasn't for them. Either way, the wide range of life's choices spread before them!
$real was either not intelligent enough for the ivy league, or unable to afford it. Either way, they got into one of the many other colleges out there.

bonus.story: $real spent time as a triggerman's assistant.
$real was imprisoned with vodou, living life as a zombie.
$real became a bounty hunter, stalking people who skip out on their bail. On the plus side, they might have gotten to star in a shitty reality trideo.
$real became famous because they $FAMOUSDESC .
$real decided that muckraking with the Corp's filth was too likely to get them silenced, so they decided to go for an easier job: covering foreign wars.

bonus.story: $real got a job at $RMEGA , becoming another gear in the corporate machine.
$real was an genuine secret agent, spying on $ENTITY for $ENTITY
$real decided getting a job just wasn't for them, instead choosing to couchsurf, or possibly live in their mother's basement.
$real flies drones in competitions around the city. Taking jobs using their drones on the side to help pay for upgrades
$real was blackbagged by a corp who wanted to take $real apart and see how they tick. Fortunately, they managed to escape, and even got to keep most of their organs.

An escort is nothing as vulgar as a prostitute: prostitutes sell their flesh, $real sells an experience. $real knows how to set the mood, to build something up, to be something the rich and powerful must seem to have to earn and conquer.
$real became a criminal, their main income coming from selling other people's cyber-VCRs, and occasionally mugging people and stealing the money they got by selling cyber-VCRs.
Need a driver for that job you want doing? Feel the need for a getaway? Contact $real at getawaydriver.me for all your driving needs, flat rates for routes inside [CITY]

$real somehow managed to get a job with one of the few government organizations that hasn't yet been privatized. Be it with the FBI, MI5, NSA, TAO, Unit 61398, or some other organization, they get to be paid less than normal people in return for working longer hours and being hated by everyone.
$real had a change of heart and instead of killing people for money protected people for free.
$real serves the Old Man of the Mountain via the matrix, hitting their enemies with enough biofeedback to leave their enemies brain leaking out of their ears.
$real hacks as a hobby, cracking code with nothing but sheer willpower and a lot of mountain dew.
$real pulled off a big job. How big? I shit you not, they $HACKDESC .
$real had the misfortune to work as a sysadmin, an unappreciated job where one has to somehow fulfill requests made by people without even the most basic computer knowledge.
$real  $COPDESC

bonus.story: $real is an expert at staying unseen in the matrix, especially when it comes to $MATRIXHIDE .
$real is a professional Johnson. $real's job is to be the line between civilization - $real's corporation - and the necessary evil of the wild men, the savages of the street.
$real decided the best way to wealth and power was also the most brutal: organized crime. Specializing in $GANGDESC , $real became well known in the $GANGTYPE

$real was an Otaku. No, not a Japanese nerd, but instead a child of the Matrix. Thankfully, Crash 2.0 hit before they suffered Fading, leaving them as a Technomancer, allowing them to keep their odd connection to the matrix for the rest of their life.
$real was a crime boss of the sea.
$real was a pirate on the high seas.
$real fought in a blood sport, punching the shit out of other people for fun and profit.
$real was one of the most dangerous things in the world: an idealist. Working for a small policlub or interest group, they got arrested multiple times in their quest to make the world a better place.
$real surfaced from the waters of academia, looked at the real world, said nope, and went straight back into academia.
$real overdosed on $CRIMEDESC decided to become a private investigator.

bonus.story: $real is a real spy, a working spy. $real is embedded where they need to be, undercover, and keeps an eye out for documents their handlers want, always being cautious, discreet, and misleading.

$real may very well only have a doctorate in fine arts, if they have one at all, but they still somehow manage to make it as a street doc, as asking no questions and working on the cheap is considered more important than actual medical training in some circles. Zoidberg would be proud.
$real decided to put his awakened talents to some other use than for the corps.

A flood is coming that will wash away the filth from the streets, and $real has a message of salvation to deliver. Their mission is paramount, they know it. $real understands that salvation comes from odd angles in these godless times, and that they might have to do unconventional things for the greater good. $real's body is strong, and their resolve is stronger.
$real decided activism is for fools. The only way to get your voice heard is force. Blowing up pubs, executing civilians, assassinations, $real has done it all.
$real is an intellectual whore, paid by megacorps to explain why $MEGAWHORE .
$real worked as a mercenary, fighting for fun and profit instead of for freedom or prophets.
$real signed on with the armed forces of one of the NANs, fighting to defend their freedom from $WARNAN .
$real was a greenshirt in service of the Tir, fighting to preserve quite possibly the most dysfunctional nation on the continent.

bonus.story: $real spent their teen years living the anarchist life.

By the time $real was a teen, they were stealing cars to order, driving the boosts to any one of the chop shops in the city. Now, when $real sees a new car in the 'hood, what $real sees is the fee in Nuyen
$real was educated by a megacorp so that he might make a better wageslave when he graduated.
$real was a child laborer in one of the few factories that hadn't fully mechanized. Their pay almost managed to pay for limbs to replace those they lost via work. Almost.
$real spent their teenage years on a farm, $FARMTASK .
$real spent their teenage years shooting at other teenagers just to gain control over a few city blocks. Just to be clear, $real was in a gang, not the Battle of Stalingrad.
$real grew up in a commune of hackers, who taught him the basics of hacking, and nothing else.
$real went to high school like a normal person.

$real was taught at home, by $HOMEDESC . While they managed to avoid the main pitfall of homeschooling and somehow ended up with a better education than their peers, $real was left emotionally stunted due to the lack of contact with others.
$real spent their teenage years in the middle of nowhere, leaving them with very little knowledge of the outside world, but a lot of knowledge about $OUTDOOR .
$real spent his teen years helping his small community at the toxic coast.
$real spent his teen years living in a small coastal town, working in the fishing industry.
$real was identified as awakened at an early age and was sent off to a wizarding school that, sadly, was much less awesome than Hogwarts.

bonus.story: $real was educated at a military school designed to instill discipline and patriotism in those  $LUCK  to be sent there.
$real was $LUCK enough to go to a respected private school.
$real spent his teen years in a private, religious school.
$real was conscripted onto a ship.
$real graduated summa cum laude from the school of hard knocks, with a major in $STREETDESC and a minor in women's studies.
$real had a tough set of teen years but managed to survive.

$real was lucky enough that their Emergence was noticed by one of the more techno friendly corporations, who gave them a free scholarship to a school that taught them how to use their powers instead of just black bagging and vivisecting them to see how they tick.
$real grew up a lab rat, used by mad scientists to test augmentations. On one hand, $real essence was irreparably shredded. On the other hand free ware! Score!

$real's parents never saw it coming. $real sold them out and milked them for all they had. $real was the invincible, the best in the world... at least, according to $real's assessment. It wasn't a walk in the park to constantly stay under the law's radar, but $real managed, even with the occasional unwelcome thoughts about $real's parents creeping into $real's mind.
$real was involved in trog gangs.
